name: CUSTOM Video with Text #4
liquid_code:
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@9/swiper-bundle.min.css"/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy

  assign body_padding_vertical = section.settings.body_padding_vertical
  assign body_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.body_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign body_padding_horizontal = section.settings.body_padding_horizontal
  assign body_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.body_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign body_radius = section.settings.body_radius
  assign body_border_thickness = section.settings.body_border_thickness
  assign body_border_color = section.settings.body_border_color
  assign body_bg_color = section.settings.body_bg_color

  assign layout_gap_mobile = section.settings.layout_gap_mobile
  assign layout_gap = section.settings.layout_gap

  assign content_position = section.settings.content_position

  assign heading = section.settings.heading
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_size_mobile = section.settings.heading_size_mobile
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_align = section.settings.heading_align
  assign heading_align_mobile = section.settings.heading_align_mobile

  assign sub_heading = section.settings.sub_heading
  assign sub_heading_size = section.settings.sub_heading_size
  assign sub_heading_size_mobile = section.settings.sub_heading_size_mobile
  assign sub_heading_color = section.settings.sub_heading_color
  assign sub_heading_custom = section.settings.sub_heading_custom
  assign sub_heading_font = section.settings.sub_heading_font
  assign sub_heading_height = section.settings.sub_heading_height
  assign sub_heading_align = section.settings.sub_heading_align
  assign sub_heading_align_mobile = section.settings.sub_heading_align_mobile
  assign sub_heading_mt = section.settings.sub_heading_mt

  assign button = section.settings.button
  assign button_url = section.settings.button_url
  assign button_size = section.settings.button_size
  assign button_size_mobile = section.settings.button_size_mobile
  assign button_color = section.settings.button_color
  assign button_hover_color = section.settings.button_hover_color
  assign button_custom = section.settings.button_custom
  assign button_font = section.settings.button_font
  assign button_height = section.settings.button_height
  assign button_mt = section.settings.button_mt
  assign button_padding_vertical = section.settings.button_padding_vertical
  assign button_padding_horizontal = section.settings.button_padding_horizontal
  assign button_radius = section.settings.button_radius
  assign button_border_thickness = section.settings.button_border_thickness
  assign button_border_color = section.settings.button_border_color
  assign button_border_hover_color = section.settings.button_border_hover_color
  assign button_bg_color = section.settings.button_bg_color
  assign button_bg_hover_color = section.settings.button_bg_hover_color
  assign button_align = section.settings.button_align
  assign button_align_mobile = section.settings.button_align_mobile
  assign button_bottom = section.settings.button_bottom

  assign slider_width_mobile = section.settings.slider_width_mobile
  assign slider_width = section.settings.slider_width
  assign slider_view = section.settings.slider_view
  assign slider_view_mobile = section.settings.slider_view_mobile
  assign slider_gap = section.settings.slider_gap
  assign slider_gap_mobile = section.settings.slider_gap_mobile
  assign slider_position_mobile = section.settings.slider_position_mobile
  assign slider_position = section.settings.slider_position

  assign card_padding_vertical = section.settings.card_padding_vertical
  assign card_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.card_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign card_padding_horizontal = section.settings.card_padding_horizontal
  assign card_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.card_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign card_radius = section.settings.card_radius
  assign card_border_thickness = section.settings.card_border_thickness
  assign card_border_color = section.settings.card_border_color
  assign card_bg_color = section.settings.card_bg_color

  assign video_radius = section.settings.video_radius
  assign video_border_thickness = section.settings.video_border_thickness
  assign video_border_color = section.settings.video_border_color
  assign video_ratio = section.settings.video_ratio
  assign video_ratio_mobile = section.settings.video_ratio_mobile
  assign radius_top = section.settings.radius_top
  assign border_bottom = section.settings.border_bottom

  assign content_padding_vertical = section.settings.content_padding_vertical
  assign content_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.content_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign content_padding_horizontal = section.settings.content_padding_horizontal
  assign content_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.content_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign content_radius = section.settings.content_radius
  assign content_border_thickness = section.settings.content_border_thickness
  assign content_border_color = section.settings.content_border_color
  assign content_bg_color = section.settings.content_bg_color

  assign name_size = section.settings.name_size
  assign name_size_mobile = section.settings.name_size_mobile
  assign name_color = section.settings.name_color
  assign name_custom = section.settings.name_custom
  assign name_font = section.settings.name_font
  assign name_height = section.settings.name_height

  assign job_size = section.settings.job_size
  assign job_size_mobile = section.settings.job_size_mobile
  assign job_color = section.settings.job_color
  assign job_custom = section.settings.job_custom
  assign job_font = section.settings.job_font
  assign job_height = section.settings.job_height
  assign job_mt = section.settings.job_mt

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile

  assign dots_size = section.settings.dots_size
  assign dots_size_mobile = section.settings.dots_size_mobile
  assign dots_show_desktop = section.settings.dots_show_desktop
  assign dots_show_mobile = section.settings.dots_show_mobile
  assign dots_color = section.settings.dots_color
  assign dots_mt = section.settings.dots_mt

  assign action_size_mobile = section.settings.action_size_mobile
  assign action_size = section.settings.action_size
  assign action_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.action_icon_size_mobile
  assign action_icon_size = section.settings.action_icon_size
  assign action_border_thickness = section.settings.action_border_thickness
  assign action_border_color = section.settings.action_border_color
  assign action_border_hover_color = section.settings.action_border_hover_color
  assign action_bg_color = section.settings.action_bg_color
  assign action_bg_hover_color = section.settings.action_bg_hover_color
  assign action_icon_color = section.settings.action_icon_color
  assign action_icon_hover_color = section.settings.action_icon_hover_color
  assign hide_action = section.settings.hide_action
  
-%}

{%- style -%}

  {{  heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  sub_heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  name_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  job_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ button_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  
  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .video-text-items-{{ section.id }} {
    background-color: {{ body_bg_color }};
    border: {{ body_border_thickness }}px solid {{ body_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ body_radius }}px;
    padding: {{ body_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ body_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(1, 1fr);
    gap: {{ layout_gap_mobile }}px;
    align-items: {{ content_position }};
  }

  .video-text-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ heading_align_mobile }};
  }
  
  .video-text-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .video-text-subheading-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ sub_heading_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    text-align: {{ sub_heading_align_mobile }};
  }

  .video-text-subheading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ sub_heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ sub_heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ sub_heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .video-text-button-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    max-width: fit-content;
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: {{ button_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    font-size: {{ button_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ button_color }};
    line-height: {{ button_height }}%;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    padding: {{ button_padding_vertical | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    border-radius: {{ button_radius }}px;
    border: {{ button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ button_border_color }};
    background-color: {{ button_bg_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    position: relative;
    font-weight: 700;
    z-index: 2;
  }

  .video-text-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    color: {{ button_hover_color }};
    border: {{ button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ button_border_hover_color }};
    background-color: {{ button_bg_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-text-right-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    min-width: 0;
  }

  .video-text-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    max-width: {{ slider_width_mobile }}%;
  }

  .video-text-slider-{{ section.id }} .swiper-wrapper {
    align-items: stretch;
  }

  .video-text-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    padding: {{ card_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ card_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ card_radius }}px;
    border: {{ card_border_thickness }}px solid {{ card_border_color }};
    background-color: {{ card_bg_color }};
    box-sizing: border-box !important; 
    height: auto !important;
    text-decoration: none;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .video-text-video-{{ section.id }} {
    flex: 1 1 auto;
    border-radius: {{ video_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .video-text-video-{{ section.id }} video,
  .video-text-video-{{ section.id }} iframe {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    box-shadow: none;
    border: 0px;
  }

  .video-text-bottom-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    gap: 20px;
    padding: {{ content_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ content_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ content_radius }}px;
    border: {{ content_border_thickness }}px solid {{ content_border_color }};
    background-color: {{ content_bg_color }};
    box-sizing: border-box !important; 
  }

  .video-text-info-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
  }

  .video-text-name-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ name_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ name_color }};
    line-height: {{ name_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .video-text-job-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: {{ job_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    font-size: {{ job_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ job_color }};
    line-height: {{ job_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .video-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .video-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 2;
    top: 50% !important;
    transform: translateY(-50%) !important;
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
  }

  .video-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
    left: 0px !important
  }

  .video-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    right: 0px !important
  }

  .video-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg,
  .video-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
  }

  .video-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
    margin-left: 3px;
  }

  .video-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg {
    transform: rotate(180deg);
  }

  .video-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg path,
  .video-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ arrow_color }};
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
  .video-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
    background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
  }

  .video-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path,
  .video-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .video-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.3;
  }

  .video-text-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
    position: static !important;
    margin-top: {{ dots_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 100%;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .video-text-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet {
    width: {{ dots_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ dots_size_mobile }}px;
    border: 2px solid {{ dots_color }};
    background-color: transparent !important;
    opacity: 0.6;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-text-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet.swiper-pagination-bullet-active {
    opacity: 1;
    background-color: {{ dots_color }} !important;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-text-action-{{ section.id }} {
    flex: 0 0 {{ action_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ action_size_mobile }}px;
    border: {{ action_border_thickness }}px solid {{ action_border_color }};
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: {{ action_bg_color }};
    display: flex !important;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-text-action-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    border: {{ action_border_thickness }}px solid {{ action_border_hover_color }};
    background: {{ action_bg_hover_color }};
  }

  .video-text-action-{{ section.id }} svg {
    height: {{ action_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    width: {{ action_icon_size_mobile }}px;
  }

  .video-text-action-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ action_icon_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  video-text-action-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ action_icon_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-text-action-{{ section.id }} .video-text-unmute-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }

  .video-text-action-{{ section.id }}.active .video-text-unmute-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
  }

  .video-text-action-{{ section.id }}.active .video-text-mute-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }
  
  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .video-text-items-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ body_padding_vertical }}px {{ body_padding_horizontal }}px;
      gap: {{ layout_gap }}px;
    }

    .video-text-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ heading_align }};
    }

    .video-text-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
    }

    .video-text-subheading-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ sub_heading_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ sub_heading_align }};
    }

    .video-text-subheading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ sub_heading_size }}px;
    }

    .video-text-button-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ button_mt }}px;
      padding: {{ button_padding_vertical }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal }}px;
      font-size: {{ button_size }}px;
    }

    .video-text-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      max-width: 100%;
    }

    .video-text-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ card_padding_vertical }}px {{ card_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .video-text-bottom-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ content_padding_vertical }}px {{ content_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .video-text-name-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ name_size }}px;
    }
  
    .video-text-job-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ job_mt }}px;
      font-size: {{ job_size }}px;
    }

    .video-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .video-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
    }

    .video-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg,
    .video-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .video-text-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ dots_mt }}px;
    }

    .video-text-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet {
      width: {{ dots_size }}px;
      height: {{ dots_size }}px;
    }

    .video-text-action-{{ section.id }} {
      flex: 0 0 {{ action_size }}px;
      height: {{ action_size }}px;
    }

    .video-text-action-{{ section.id }} svg {
      width: {{ action_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ action_icon_size }}px;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}rem;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .video-text-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ heading_font.family }}, {{ heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if sub_heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .video-text-subheading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ sub_heading_font.family }}, {{ sub_heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ sub_heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ sub_heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if name_custom %}
  <style>
    .video-text-name-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ name_font.family }}, {{ name_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ name_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ name_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if job_custom %}
  <style>
    .video-text-job-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ job_font.family }}, {{ job_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ job_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ job_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if button_custom %}
  <style>
    .video-text-button-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ button_font.family }}, {{ button_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ button_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ button_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if border_bottom %}
  <style>
    .video-text-video-{{ section.id }} {
      border-bottom: {{ video_border_thickness }}px solid {{ video_border_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .video-text-video-{{ section.id }} {
      border: {{ video_border_thickness }}px solid {{ video_border_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if radius_top %}
  <style>
    .video-text-video-{{ section.id }},
    .video-text-video-{{ section.id }} video,
    .video-text-video-{{ section.id }} iframe {
      border-bottom-left-radius: 0px;
      border-bottom-right-radius: 0px;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if video_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .video-text-video-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: 9.6/11; 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif video_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    .video-text-video-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: 12/7; 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif video_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .video-text-video-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if video_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .video-text-video-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 9.6/11; 
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif video_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-text-video-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 12/7; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif video_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-text-video-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-text-video-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: auto; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .video-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .video-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
    
    .video-text-right-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: 0px {{ arrow_size_mobile | plus: 10 }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .video-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .video-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .video-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }

      .video-text-right-{{ section.id }} {
        padding: 0px {{ arrow_size | plus: 10 }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .video-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }

      .video-text-right-{{ section.id }} {
        padding: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if dots_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .video-text-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex !important;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .video-text-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if dots_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-text-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-text-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slider_position_mobile == "first" %}
  <style>
    .video-text-left-{{ section.id }} {
      order: 2;
    }

    .video-text-right-{{ section.id }} {
      order: 1;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .video-text-left-{{ section.id }} {
      order: 1;
    }

    .video-text-right-{{ section.id }} {
      order: 2;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slider_position == "first" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-text-left-{{ section.id }} {
        order: 2;
      }
  
      .video-text-right-{{ section.id }} {
        order: 1;
      }

      .video-text-items-{{ section.id }} {
        grid-template-columns: calc({{ slider_width }}% - {{ layout_gap | times: 0.5 }}px) calc((100% - {{ slider_width }}%) - {{ layout_gap | times: 0.5 }}px);
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-text-left-{{ section.id }} {
        order: 1;
      }
  
      .video-text-right-{{ section.id }} {
        order: 2;
      }

      .video-text-items-{{ section.id }} {
        grid-template-columns: calc((100% - {{ slider_width }}%) - {{ layout_gap | times: 0.5 }}px) calc({{ slider_width }}% - {{ layout_gap | times: 0.5 }}px);
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if button_align_mobile == "center" %}
  <style>
   .video-text-button-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: auto;
      margin-right: auto;
    } 
  </style>
{% elsif button_align_mobile == "right" %}
  <style>
   .video-text-button-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: auto;
    } 
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if button_align == "center" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .video-text-button-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-left: auto !important;
        margin-right: auto !important;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif button_align == "right" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .video-text-button-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-left: auto !important;
        margin-right: 0px !important;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .video-text-button-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-left: 0px !important;
        margin-right: 0px !important;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if button_bottom %}
  <style>
    .video-text-button-top-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }
    
    .video-text-button-bottom-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex !important;
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-text-button-top-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex !important;
      }
      
      .video-text-button-bottom-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .video-text-button-top-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex !important;
    }
    
    .video-text-button-bottom-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-text-button-top-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} video-text-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">

      <div class="video-text-items-{{ section.id }}">
        
        <div class="video-text-left-{{ section.id }}">
          
          {% if heading != blank %}
            <div class="video-text-heading-{{ section.id }}">{{ heading }}</div>
          {% endif %}
          
          {% if sub_heading != blank %}
            <div class="video-text-subheading-{{ section.id }}">{{ sub_heading }}</div>
          {% endif %}

          {% if button != blank %}
            <a href="{{ button_url }}" class="video-text-button-{{ section.id }} {% if button_bottom %}video-text-button-top-{{ section.id }}{% endif %}">{{ button }}</a>
          {% endif %}
          
        </div>

        <div class="video-text-right-{{ section.id }}">
          <div class="video-text-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper">
            <div class="swiper-wrapper">
              {% for block in section.blocks %}
                <div class="video-text-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                  <div class="video-text-video-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% assign video_id =  block.settings.video.id | default: block.settings.video_url.id %}
                      {%- if block.settings.video == null and block.settings.video_url != null -%}
                        
                        {% if block.settings.loop %}
                          {% assign loop = '&loop=1&playlist=' | append: video_id %}
                        {% endif %}
          
                        {% if block.settings.autoplay %}
                          {% assign autoplay = '&mute=1&autoplay=1' %}
                        {% endif %}

                        {% if block.settings.autoplay %}
                          {% assign autoplay_2 = '&autoplay=1' %}
                        {% endif %}
                        
                        {%- if block.settings.video_url.type == 'youtube' -%}
                          <iframe
                            data-src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1{{ autoplay }}{{ loop }}"
                            data-src1="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1{{ autoplay_2 }}{{ loop }}"
                            data-src2 = "https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1{{ loop }}"
                            data-src3 = "https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1{{ autoplay }}{{ loop }}"
                            class="js-youtube lazy"
                            allow="autoplay; encrypted-media"
                            allowfullscreen
                            title="Fixed Video"
                          ></iframe>
                        {%- else -%}
                          <iframe
                            data-src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}{{ autoplay }}{{ loop }}"
                            data-src1="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1{{ autoplay_2 }}{{ loop }}"
                            data-src2 = "https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1{{ loop }}"
                            data-src3 = "https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1{{ autoplay }}{{ loop }}"
                            class="js-vimeo lazy"
                            allow="autoplay; encrypted-media"
                            allowfullscreen
                            title="Fixed Video"
                          ></iframe>
                        {% endif %}
                      {% else %}

                        <video {% if block.settings.poster != blank %}poster="{{ block.settings.poster | image_url }}"{% endif %} data-src="{{ block.settings.video.sources[1].url }}" playsinline {% if block.settings.loop %}loop{% endif %} {% if block.settings.autoplay %}autoplay muted{% endif %} {% if block.settings.controls %}controls{% endif %} preload="none" class="lazy"></video>
                      {% endif %}
                  </div>
                  <div class="video-text-bottom-{{ section.id }}">
                    <div class="video-text-info-{{ section.id }}">
                      
                      {% if block.settings.name != blank %}
                        <p class="video-text-name-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.name }}</p>
                      {% endif %}

                      {% if block.settings.job != blank %}
                        <p class="video-text-job-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.job }}</p>
                      {% endif %}
                    </div>

                    {% unless hide_action %}
                      <div class="video-text-action-{{ section.id }}">
                        <svg class="video-text-mute-{{ section.id }}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  viewBox="0 0 50 50" width="50px" height="50px"><path d="M 1 0 C 0.75 0 0.511719 0.113281                       </div>
                    {% endunless %}
                  </div>
                </div>
              {% endfor %}
            </div>
            <div class="video-text-pagination-{{ section.id }} swiper-pagination"></div>
          </div>
          <button class="video-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
            <svg version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" x="0px" y="0px"
               width="307.046px" height="307.046px" viewBox="0 0 307.046 307.046" style="enable-background:new 0 0 307.046 307.046;"
               xml:space="preserve">
              <path d="M281.828,142.427L144.002,4.597c-6.129-6.129-16.07-6.129-22.199,0l-11.101,11.101c-6.133,6.133-6.133,16.076,0,22.201
                  l92.071,92.077H36.321c-8.668,0-15.701,7.035-15.701,15.701v15.699c0,8.664,7.033,15.701,15.701,15.701h166.445l-92.063,92.059
                  c-6.133,6.136-6.133,16.086,0,22.209l11.101,11.101c6.129,6.136,16.07,6.136,22.199,0l137.826-137.831
                  C287.959,158.487,287.959,148.556,281.828,142.427z"/>
            
            </svg>
          </button>
          <button class="video-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
            <svg version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" x="0px" y="0px"
               width="307.046px" height="307.046px" viewBox="0 0 307.046 307.046" style="enable-background:new 0 0 307.046 307.046;"
               xml:space="preserve">
              <path d="M281.828,142.427L144.002,4.597c-6.129-6.129-16.07-6.129-22.199,0l-11.101,11.101c-6.133,6.133-6.133,16.076,0,22.201
                  l92.071,92.077H36.321c-8.668,0-15.701,7.035-15.701,15.701v15.699c0,8.664,7.033,15.701,15.701,15.701h166.445l-92.063,92.059
                  c-6.133,6.136-6.133,16.086,0,22.209l11.101,11.101c6.129,6.136,16.07,6.136,22.199,0l137.826-137.831
                  C287.959,158.487,287.959,148.556,281.828,142.427z"/>
            
            </svg>
          </button>

          {% if button_bottom and button != blank %}
            <a href="{{ button_url }}" class="video-text-button-{{ section.id }} video-text-button-bottom-{{ section.id }}">{{ button }}</a>
          {% endif %}
        </div>
        
      </div>
      
    </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-lazyload@19.1.3/dist/lazyload.min.js"></script> 
                
<script>
  function loadSwiper(callback) {
    if (window.Swiper) {
      callback();
    } else {
      const script = document.createElement('script');
      script.src = "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@8.4.7/swiper-bundle.min.js";
      script.onload = callback;
      document.head.appendChild(script);
    }
  }
  
  function initVideoWithText4(sectionId) {

    var lazyLoadInstance = new LazyLoad();

    window.addEventListener(
      "LazyLoad::Initialized",
      function (event) {
        window.lazyLoadInstance = event.detail.instance;
      },
      false
    );
    
    const slider = new Swiper(`.video-text-slider-${sectionId}`, {
      speed: 300,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: `.video-text-btn-next-${sectionId}`,
        prevEl: `.video-text-btn-prev-${sectionId}`
      },
      pagination: {
        el: `video-text-pagination-${sectionId}`,
        draggable: true,
        clickable: true
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap_mobile }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view_mobile }}
        },
        768: {
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap_mobile }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }}
        },
        1024: {
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view }}
        }
      },
      on: {
        slideChange: function () {
          const slides = this.slides;
    
          for (let i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
            let video = slides[i].querySelector('video');
            let frame = slides[i].querySelector('iframe');
            let btn = slides[i].querySelector(`.video-text-action-${sectionId}`);
            let src3;
            let src2;
            let src1;
            if(frame) {
              src3 = frame.getAttribute('data-src3');
              src2 = frame.getAttribute('data-src2');
              src1 = frame.getAttribute('data-src1');
            }
    
            if (i === this.activeIndex) {
              if (video) {
                video.play();
              }

              if(btn) {
                if(btn.classList.contains('active')) {
                  if(frame) {
                    frame.src = src1;
                  }
                } else {
                  if(frame) {
                    frame.src = src3;
                  }
                }
              } else {
                if(frame) {
                  frame.src = src3;
                }
              }
            } else {
              if (video) {
                video.pause();
              }

              if(frame) {
                frame.src = src2;
              }
            }
          }
        },
      },
    });

    document.querySelectorAll(`.video-text-slide-${sectionId}`).forEach(el => {
      let btn = el.querySelector(`.video-text-action-${sectionId}`);
      let frame = el.querySelector('iframe');
      let src;
      if(frame) {
        src = frame.getAttribute("data-src1");
      }
      let video = el.querySelector('video');
      if(btn) {
         btn.addEventListener('click', () => {
          btn.classList.toggle('active');
          if(btn.classList.contains('active')) {
            if(frame) {
              frame.src = src;
            }
            if(video) {
              video.muted = false;
              video.setAttribute("mute", "false"); 
            }
          } else {
            if(frame) {
              frame.src += "&mute=1";
            }
            if(video) {
              video.muted = true;
              video.setAttribute("mute", "true"); 
            }
          }
        }) 
      }
    })
  }

  function initializeAllVideoWithText4Sections() {
    const sections = document.querySelectorAll('[id^="shopify-section-"]');
    sections.forEach(section => {
      if (section.querySelector('.video-text-{{ section.id }}')) {
        const sectionId = section.id.replace('shopify-section-', '');
        loadSwiper(() => initVideoWithText4(sectionId));
      }
    });
  }

  if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initializeAllVideoWithText4Sections);
  } else {
    initializeAllVideoWithText4Sections();
  }

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', (event) => {
      const sectionId = event.detail.sectionId;
      if (event.target.querySelector('.video-text-{{ section.id }}')) {
        loadSwiper(() => initVideoWithText4(sectionId));
      }
    });
  }
</script>
